General.Name: Westports Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Westports Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, develops and manages ports. The company operates a port under the Westports name in Port Klang, Malaysia.It offers container cargo services; conventional services, including dry bulk, break bulk, liquid bulk, cement cargo, and roll-on-roll-off services; and marine services. The company also operates terminal facilities. Westports Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Port Klang, Malaysia.
